TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable CantStartSingleInstanceException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 當單一執行個體 (Instance) 應用程式的後續執行個體無法連接到第一個應用程式執行個體時，會擲回這個例外狀況。

span.span: This exception is thrown when a subsequent instance of a single-instance application is unable to connect to the first application instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 單一執行個體的應用程式與從一般應用程式中，只有一個執行個體的應用程式可以執行一次。A single-instance application differs from a normal application in that only one instance of the application can be running at a time. 後續的應用程式執行個體啟動時，它會嘗試連絡第一個執行個體應用程式，將其命令列引數傳遞。When a subsequent application instance starts, it attempts to contact the first instance application to pass its command-line arguments. 如果無法連絡第一個執行個體，中後續的應用程式執行個體將會引發。If the first instance cannot be contacted, the is raised in the subsequent application instance. Visual Basic 應用程式模型不提供任何例外狀況中的內容資訊。The Visual Basic Application Model does not provide any context information in the exception. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 單一執行個體的應用程式與從一般應用程式中，只有一個執行個體的應用程式可以執行一次。A single-instance application differs from a normal application in that only one instance of the application can be running at a time. 後續的應用程式執行個體啟動時，它會嘗試連絡第一個執行個體應用程式，將其命令列引數傳遞。When a subsequent application instance starts, it attempts to contact the first instance application to pass its command-line arguments. 如果無法連絡第一個執行個體，中後續的應用程式執行個體將會引發。If the first instance cannot be contacted, the is raised in the subsequent application instance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |-|-| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: A message that describes the error.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 繼承自 。 inherits from . 這個建構函式設定的屬性物件下表所示。This constructor sets the properties of the object as shown in the following table. |屬性Property|值Value| |-|-| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| ||`message`字串。The `message` string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyspecialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 物件，包含有關擲回之例外狀況的序列化物件資料。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.

param.name: context
param.span: 物件，包含關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

span.span: The object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 使用序列化資料，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception inner) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, inner As Exception)

param.name: inner
param.span: 導致目前例外狀況的 物件。

span.span: The object that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 參數不是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，則會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。

span.span: If the parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回相同的值如果傳遞到建構函式，則為 null 參考屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |-|-| ||`inner`參考。The `inner` reference.| ||`message`字串。The `message` string.|
